item.title: 科学家们逐步解开"接吻病"之谜
item.description: 科学家们发现，感染了导致"接吻病"的病毒后，患者体内有22个基因会增加患狼疮、中风和类风湿性关节炎等疾病的风险。【原文：Scientists have identified 22 genes that increase the risk of conditions like lupus, stroke, and rheumatoid arthritis in patients who’ve caught the virus behind mono, an illness known as the “kissing disease.”】

item.title: 美元走软及特朗普对生物燃料的评论提振需求，推动农产品价格上涨
item.description: 芝加哥市场小麦价格创下自11月以来最大涨幅，玉米和大豆价格也同步上涨。近期美元走软提振了市场对美国农作物的需求预期。【原文：Wheat soared the most since November while corn and soybeans also gained in Chicago as a recent slide in the US dollar boosted demand expectations for American crops.】

item.title: 非洲最大水厂爆炸事件导致约翰内斯堡供水受阻
item.description: 非洲最大水处理厂发生爆炸，导致为1100多万人供水的水系统供水受限。这一最新挫折凸显了南非基础设施的衰败。【原文：An explosion at Africa’s biggest water-treatment plant is curbing supplies in a system that serves more than 11 million people, the latest setback highlighting the decay of infrastructure in South Africa.】

item.title: 德国监管机构认为养老基金亏损超出其监管范围
item.description: 德国最高金融监管机构表示，已注意到多家养老基金接连出现亏损的情况，但同时指出这些案件不属于其监管范围。【原文：Germany’s top financial watchdog said it has taken note of a string of losses at several pension funds but also pointed out those cases are outside its remit.】

item.title: 安哥拉拟发行17亿美元债券，非洲债券发行规模持续扩大
item.description: 安哥拉正考虑在今年国际资本市场发行17亿美元债券，加入从肯尼亚到刚果民主共和国等非洲大陆各国潜在债券发行国的行列。【原文：Angola is weighing plans to issue a $1.7 billion bond on international capital markets this year, joining a list of prospective issuers across the continent from Kenya to the Democratic Republic of Congo.】

item.title: 卫星制造商约克公司围绕特朗普的黄金穹顶打造IPO推介方案
item.description: 约克太空系统公司正将其为五角大楼"黄金穹顶"项目批量生产廉价卫星的能力作为首次公开募股的卖点，投资者正寻求参与这项预计耗资1750亿美元的导弹防御系统计划。【原文：York Space Systems Inc. is touting its ability to churn out cheap satellites for the Pentagon’s Golden Dome project as a selling point for its IPO, as investors look for exposure to the estimated $175 billion in spending on the proposed missile shield.】

item.title: 日元暴跌，因贝森特排除干预汇率的可能性
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率下跌，此前美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特表示，美国"绝对不会"干预日本货币市场。【原文：The yen sank against the dollar after Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the US is “absolutely not” intervening in the market for Japan’s currency.】

item.title: LIV高尔夫计划首次出售特许经营权股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，LIV高尔夫正计划首次出售旗下球队的少数股权，目标估值高达3亿美元。【原文：LIV Golf is looking to sell minority stakes in its teams for the first time, targeting valuations of up to $300 million, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国未干预日元汇率，力挺强势美元
item.description: 财政部长斯科特·贝森特驳斥了美国可能考虑干预外汇市场抛售美元换取日元的猜测，并重申了长期奉行的"强势美元政策"。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent cooled speculation that the US may be considering intervening in the foreign-exchange market to sell the dollar for Japanese yen, and touted the long-standing “strong-dollar policy.”】

item.title: 金矿公司CEO因神秘付款遭罢免后重返非洲矿业
item.description: 塞巴斯蒂安·德·蒙特苏——因涉嫌违规付款被罢免恩德弗矿业公司首席执行官职务——现已重掌一家专注于非洲市场的黄金矿业公司。【原文：Sebastien de Montessus — ousted as boss of Endeavour Mining Plc over alleged irregular payments — is back at the helm of an Africa-focused gold miner.】

item.title: 债券交易员发现新途径提前洞察美国信贷市场
item.description: 欧洲新规正推动美国公司债券交易向24小时实时交易迈进，并助力美国市场参与者在交易日更早时段获得更真实的价格。【原文：New rules in Europe are bringing US corporate bonds closer to real-time 24-hour trading — and helping American market players get more realistic prices earlier in the day.】

item.title: 捷克政策制定者等待合适时机再降息一次
item.description: 捷克央行董事会成员表示，尽管需要更多证据表明通胀压力正在缓解，但该国政策制定者今年可能仍有空间降息。【原文：Czech policymakers may have room to make an interest-rate cut this year, though more evidence that inflationary pressures are easing will be needed, according to a member of the central bank’s board.】

item.title: 科威特石油公司扩大新能源交易部门业务范围
item.description: 科威特石油公司成立其迪拜能源贸易部门六个月后，正扩大该部门的业务范围。【原文：Kuwait Petroleum Corporation is expanding the remit of its Dubai-based energy trading arm six months after creating the unit.】

item.title: CSG的IPO揭示了银行家如何适应破坏交易的世界事件
item.description: 近年来，地缘政治因素对首次公开募股造成了严重干扰，但银行家们认为他们或许已找到应对混乱局面的方法。【原文：Geopolitics has been playing havoc with initial public offerings in recent years, but bankers believe they may have now found a way to manage the chaos.】

item.title: 大众汽车将扩大从中国出口规模，电动汽车价格战冲击汽车制造商
item.description: 大众汽车集团计划增加中国制造的汽车出口量，该制造商试图借此从亚洲国家的低生产成本中获益，尽管当地正经历一场激烈的价格战。【原文：Volkswagen AG plans to increase exports of cars made in China as the manufacturer tries to benefit from the Asian country’s low production costs amid a bruising price war there.】

item.title: 瑞士计划十年内提高增值税以重整军队
item.description: 瑞士计划暂时提高其增值税税率，以增加军事开支。【原文：Switzerland plans a temporary increase of its value-added tax to boost spending for the military.】

item.title: 安宁顿公司因军用住宅出售引发的10亿美元债务纠纷持续升级
item.description: 安宁顿融资公司正与部分债权人陷入日益激烈的纠纷，争议焦点在于该公司可能违约的7.28亿英镑（10亿美元）债务。【原文：Annington Funding is facing off against some of its creditors in an increasingly heated dispute over a potential default on £728 million ($1 billion) worth of debt.】

item.title: 欧盟瞄准卡塔尔和加拿大天然气以减少对美国液化天然气的依赖
item.description: 欧盟能源事务负责人表示，该集团对其对美国液化天然气的依赖日益担忧，尤其是在特朗普总统威胁要接管格陵兰岛之后。【原文：The European Union’s energy chief said the bloc is growing increasingly concerned about its dependence on US liquefied natural gas, particularly in the wake of President Donald Trump’s threats to take over Greenland.】

item.title: 阿波罗商业房地产投资信托基金向保险部门出售90亿美元资产组合
item.description: 由阿波罗全球管理公司运营的一家房地产贷款机构同意将其贷款组合出售给该私募股权公司的保险部门，此前这家公开上市的房地产投资信托基金股价持续低于其账面价值。【原文：A property lender managed by Apollo Global Management Inc. agreed to sell its portfolio to the buyout firm’s insurance arm after the publicly listed real estate investment trust consistently traded below its book value.】

item.title: 莫桑比克降息，称宽松周期即将结束
item.description: 莫桑比克央行延续了其最长的降息周期，将基准利率降至历史最低水平，同时暗示进一步宽松的空间有限。【原文：Mozambique’s central bank extended its longest rate-cutting cycle, lowering its benchmark to a record low, while signaling that there is limited scope for further easing.】

item.title: 尼日利亚在叛乱分子袭击地区推出石油区块
item.description: 尼日利亚向投资者开放了其东北边境附近的油田区块，该地区与伊斯兰武装分子的冲突已持续数十年。【原文：Nigeria offered investors oil blocks near its northeastern border, where a conflict with Islamist insurgents has been ongoing for decades.】

item.title: 汽车救援公司RAC准备选择银行进行伦敦首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，道路救援和汽车保险公司RAC即将选定银行牵头其在伦敦的首次公开募股。【原文：Breakdown cover and car insurance company RAC is close to selecting banks to lead its initial public offering in London, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大央行维持利率在2.25%不变，因不确定性束缚利率路径
item.description: 加拿大央行维持利率不变，但官员们明确表示，他们不确定暂停加息的持续时间，也不确定借贷成本的走向。【原文：The Bank of Canada held interest rates steady, but officials made clear that they’re not sure about the duration of their pause, nor in which direction borrowing costs are headed.】

item.title: 标普500指数突破7000点关口，美联储会议与科技巨头财报即将揭晓
item.description: 科技公司乐观的财报和业绩指引推动周三美股走高，市场正等待微软公司、Meta平台公司等企业发布财报，以及美联储今日下午的利率决议。【原文：Bullish earnings and guidance from tech companies helped to lift US stocks on Wednesday, ahead of reports from the likes of Microsoft Corp. and Meta Platforms Inc. and the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision this afternoon.】

item.title: 美国面临评级压力但前景稳定，惠誉首席经济学家表示
item.description: 惠誉评级公司首席主权分析师表示，在惠誉刚刚剥夺美国最高评级后，短期内再次下调美国评级将是不寻常之举。【原文：Another US downgrade any time soon would be an unusual move so quickly after Fitch Ratings stripped the country of its top score, according to the company’s chief sovereign analyst.】

item.title: 苏格兰首次发债引发银行家争抢500万英镑佣金
item.description: 银行和律师事务所正争相争取为苏格兰政府推出其首次债券计划提供服务的佣金。【原文：Banks and law firms are jostling for fees to help the Scottish government launch its debut bond program.】

item.title: 标普500指数突破7000点关口，科技股在美联储会议前强势反弹
item.description: 标普500指数首次突破7000点大关，投资者在备受关注的美联储利率决议及"七大科技巨头"财报发布前夕竞相买入科技股。【原文：The S&P 500 Index rose past 7,000 points for the first time as investors bid up technology stocks ahead of a closely watched Federal Reserve rate decision and earnings from a trio of Magnificent Seven firms.】

item.title: 伊朗风险阴云笼罩，原油期权迎来2024年以来最长的看涨行情
item.description: 原油交易商正为看涨期权支付溢价，这是近14个月来持续时间最长的溢价交易。他们纷纷涌入期权市场，以防范美伊可能爆发新冲突的风险。【原文：Oil traders are paying a premium for bullish call options for the longest stretch in about 14 months as they huddle in the options market to protect against the risk of a new confrontation between the US and Iran.】

item.title: 银行推出5.5亿美元债券助力TreeHouse食品公司杠杆收购融资
item.description: 德意志银行牵头的银团已开始推销5.5亿美元垃圾债券，该债券将为TreeHouse食品公司即将进行的收购提供资金支持，使该交易的计划融资总额达到18亿美元。【原文：Banks led by Deutsche Bank AG have begun marketing a $550 million junk bond that will help fund TreeHouse Foods Inc.’s pending buyout, bringing planned financing for the deal to $1.8 billion.】

item.title: 法国电力公司将于明年修复西沃核反应堆的裂纹管道
item.description: 法国电力公司将在明年计划性停机检修期间修复其西沃1号核反应堆的裂纹管道，从而避免意外停运。【原文：Electricite de France SA will repair cracked pipes at its Civaux 1 nuclear reactor during a scheduled maintenance halt next year, avoiding an unplanned outage.】
